title: Connecting underscore gap font - techno sans
content:
Gentlemen,

I need your assistance as I am unable to find this font for reuse:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110319im_/http:/typophile.com/files/schriftzug_4825.jpg)

Thank you in advance!  
twostroke

Font: 

 Republika 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110319/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: twostroke

comments.content: It looks like **[Republika II (Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110319/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Republika%20II%20-%20Italic&fid=8d612ba20c6074ffba4bb83a6412d75a&fsize=60&text=perfect%20alibi&fit=1)** free font by Apostrophic Labs (probably combined with Republika IV or some other variant)
